content:
That sounds like a great approach. I think I'll create a task for each section of my proposal and then break down each section into smaller tasks. I'll also make sure to prioritize my tasks based on importance and urgency. 

By the way, I remember that I worked on the proposal for a new project on Thursday, but I didn't finish it. I should probably create a task to finish that proposal and add it to my task list. 

Do you think I should create a separate project in Asana for my proposal, or should I just add it to my existing task list?
